cars.description: This is an immaculate 2006 Nissan Rogue with only 25k miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a used 2006 Honda Accord with 116k miles. Well maintained.
This is a gently used 2016 Chevy Malibu. It has less than 2000 miles. A must see!
2013 Ford F150 SuperCrew XLT Short Bed. Black with gray cloth seating. Power locks and windows. New tires. Priced to sell.
